prompt:
Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Kageyama. It's critical to be in good health for your procedure. Now, for my last question, have you arranged for a ride home after your procedure?

Patient: Yeah. My son's gonna let him know.

Nurse: That's great to hear, Mr. Kageyama. It's critical to have someone available to take you home after the procedure. I'm glad to hear that your son will be there for you. Do you have any other questions or concerns about the logistics of your procedure?

Patient: Nope.

Nurse: Alright, Mr. Kageyama. That was all the topics for today. Before we wrap up, do you have any other questions or concerns that you'd like to discuss?

Patient: No. I don't. Hello?

Nurse: Yes, Mr. Kageyama, I'm here. I'm glad to hear that you don't have any other questions. To summarize, we discussed your upcoming colonoscopy on August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. We went over your diet, medication, and bowel prep instructions. We also confirmed that you're feeling well and have arranged for a ride home after your procedure. Does that sound right?

Patient: Yep.

responses.gpt4: That's great. I want to remind you, Mr. Kageyama, that I'm here for you every step of the way. You're not in this alone. I will call you again the day before your procedure to go over all the prep instructions, step by step. Do you have any other questions or concerns before we end this call?
responses.our_model: Okay, Mr. Kageyama. I'm glad to hear that our discussion has been helpful. Remember, I'm here for you every step of the way. I will call you again the day before the procedure to go over step by step all the prep instructions. If you have any questions in the meantime, you can call us back at 641-381-6523. Does that sound good to you?
